title: Chlorophyll-a deviation from the global average
subtitle: The share of satellite imagery pixels measuring [chlorophyll-a](#dod:chlorophyll-a) within a country's [Exclusive Economic Zone](#dod:eez) that are above the 90th percentile of the global baseline (2000-2004). The value given is an annual average of monthly deviations. High levels can indicate pollution from fertilizers and other sources.
